title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.5 - Filing of claims of designated officers and employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.5 - Filing of claims of designated officers and employees

State Regulations

Claims of designated officers and employees shall be filed
in the same manner as any other claim for compensation under the Workers'
Compensation Law. When a claim has been filed, and an issue of fact or law
arises, the chair shall appoint an arbitrator in accordance with the provisions
of section
303.6
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
303.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
